data: {"generalSituation":"A dry northeast monsoon will affect southern China today. A broad band of clouds will cover the coastal areas in the next couple of days. A fresh to strong easterly airstream will affect the coast of Guangdong midweek this week. A replenishment of the monsoon is expected to affect southern China over the weekend.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20251026","week":"Sunday","forecastWind":"North to northeast force 4.","forecastWeather":"Cloudy periods in the morning and at night.
